MainWindow.h Example File

examples/qespta/MainWindow.h 
    /**
     * @file MainWindow.h
     * @brief Application's Main Window.
     * @see MainWindow
     * @author Micha? Policht
     */

    #ifndef MAINWINDOW_H_
    #define MAINWINDOW_H_

    #include <QMainWindow>

    class QMenu;
    class QAction;

    class MainWindow : public QMainWindow
    {
            Q_OBJECT

        //@{
            QMenu *fileMenu;
        QAction *exitAct;
            QMenu *helpMenu;
        QAction *aboutAct;
        //@}

    private:
        void createMenus();
        void createActions();

    private slots:
        void about();

    public:
        MainWindow(const QString &title);

    };

    #endif /*MAINWINDOW_H_*/
